content.title: Document Content
content.visibleText:
1. At Copilot, we understand the importance of keeping your data secure and ensuring no AI is ever being trained on your data.
2. In short, any data used by Copilot is anonymized and encrypted.
3. As a Copilot user, you can trust...
4. Since we are a cloud-based service, all data is securely stored and processed in our secure servers.
5. The only time we'll ever query your data is when you explicitly ask us to do so.
6. The only review is manually done by our team of experts.
7. How do we manage data?
8. Extra steps for data security include...
9. It all starts with how we use the data...
10. Stay ahead with the help of Copilot's advanced security measures.
11. 12 keywords are used to find all the relevant documents.
12. Here is an example of how steps 1-11 are implemented in our system:
13. Copilot filters relevant documents...
14. Filtered articles are sent to...
15. Copilot displays the answer to the user.

content.title: Jive CoPilot - Educational Series Part 2
content.layoutDescription: Main content area of the browser
content.visibleText:
At CoPilot, we understand the importance of keeping your data private and secure. We handle your data with the utmost care and ensure it is never being trained on or used to train our models.

Watch the video below to learn more about our commitment to keeping your data secure and never being trained on or used to train our models.

How does Copilot use your data?

Q: Do Jive or CoPilot store our content?
A: Since you are a Jive Cloud customer, we already store your content in the Cloud and nothing has changed. Unlike other commercial models, CoPilot does not store or analyze your data elsewhere for CoPilot when you aren't using it.

Select a video or drag and drop videos straight from your desktop.

You can also check the getting started guide if you'd like to watch our training videos for CoPilot.

activitySummary: The user is actively engaged in editing and managing content on the Guidde platform. They are working on a video titled 'How does Copilot use your data?' and are seen sharing the video publicly, adjusting sharing settings, and copying the embed code. This indicates a focus on content creation and distribution, likely for educational or marketing purposes.

Simultaneously, the user is working on an email campaign in HubSpot. They are editing an email titled 'Jive CoPilot - Educational Series Part 2'. The email content includes information about data security and privacy practices of Copilot, suggesting the user is preparing a detailed communication to inform or educate recipients about these topics. The user is seen adjusting the layout and content of the email, ensuring it is well-structured and informative.

The user is also seen accessing their Gmail inbox, indicating they are managing their emails alongside their other tasks. This multitasking behavior shows the user is handling various aspects of their workflow, from content creation and email marketing to communication management.
